title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is being marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made to the file.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirtied.
SR:
1. Open a file in the code editor.
2. Trigger code assist by pressing a specific key combination.
3. Note that the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made to the file.
